page.title: 01OUTLINE OF THE AREA
page.content: The area lies to the west of Grimsby and includes the villages of Healing and Great Coates. Healing is a large village with a population of about 2,500. It has a range of housing, but is dominated by owner-occupied detached and semi-detached houses. The village functions as a dormitory village for Grimsby. Most people in the village work either in Grimsby or in the Humber Bank industries. With the opening of the A180 motorway link road about 18 months ago, the way is now open for further housing development in the village. The western edge of Grimsby in our block includes the village of Great Coates which has now joined up with the town as housing has extended westwards. Two large new housing estates are included.
